getExecutionData(bytes4).details: If the selector is a native function, the module address will be the address of the account.

params.selector: The selector to get the data for.

returns._0: The execution data for this selector.

getValidationData(bytes24).details: If the selector is a native function, the module address will be the address of the account.

params.validationFunction: The validation function to get the data for.

returns._0: The validation data for this validation function.

getExecutionData(bytes4).notice: Get the execution data for a selector.

getValidationData(bytes24).notice: Get the validation data for a validation function.
